Description:
Compress target file into a cab file stored in the Alternate Data Stream (ADS) of the target file.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Diantz Alternate Data Stream Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%diantz.exe%' and command like '%.cab%') and command re ':[^\\]'
